revised_title: Development of the Crustacean Embryo and Variations in Larval Forms of Podophthalmia
tldr: The author examines the development of the crustacean embryo and the variations in larval forms of 38 genera of Podophthalmia. Through the study of larvae from exotic species, the author identifies parent forms, observes the unity of character in various forms, and traces the origin of the nervous system and the development of the eyes in crustaceans.
